articles.description: At the National Conference of Power and New & Renewable Energy Ministers of States & UTs, Singh detailed the government's approach to meeting the country's escalating power demand, indicative of its rapid economic growth.
articles.content: New Delhi: Union minister for power and new & renewable energy RK Singh has urged states to prioritize renewable energy for agricultural use to conserve coal-based capacity for non-solar hours. A… [+1620 chars]
